hero-p: I am a Front-End Developer. I am bringing ideas to life with my skills, as well as creating dynamic and interactive Web experiences. I love to work with templates and to personalise them according to the unique requirements of the individual projects. Let us work together to create something magnificent.

about-p.1: Hello, we have already got aquanted before. I am born in Bulgaria and I live in the city of Varna. I spend my time with programming, playing video games and I love the world of movies. I am always trying to be a good listener and to take advantage of the opportunities that life is presenting me. I am always putting care and responsibility in completing my tasks. I live a wholesome life, centered around family love, friendship and respect.
about-p.2: I have acquired lots of skills and experience through the years. That made me a better man, who is taking every job with great responsibility. I have been working in various branches, taking in everything I can. This has been of great use developing my teamwork, skill range, creative way of thinking and it helped me be organized most of all. I have expanded my knowledge with lessons from Web development & software academy. My goal is to work in programming and to achieve maximum results in everything I do. My aim is constant improvement and learning, so I can keep up with the latest trends and to be able to give the best of me.
